radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: New connection between the true lumen and new false lumen observed in 2014, representing an acute-on-chronic type B aortic dissection with a dTAA of 8.0 cm and an aortic arch aneurysm of 4.5 to 5 cm.

radiographic_examinations.findings: True lumen and false lumen with thrombus, new intimal tear causing contrast material to pass from true lumen to new false lumen, mediastinal hematoma observed.
Patency of the endograft confirmed without flow across the new intimal tear.
Endograft within the true lumen, flow within false lumen, and thrombus present in the false lumen.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Endograft was explanted and replaced with a 30-mm Hemashield vascular graft.
